content:
While passing through the festive plaza,
Fireworks exploded,
Seeing strange supernatural objects on passersby, I ran away in fright.
info: 闲聊-花火祭即将到来闲聊-1004夙夜_单一闲聊

content:
At the fireworks festival,
The sky, the land, the sea, and people alike,
All share the same brilliant warmth.
info: 闲聊-花火祭即将到来闲聊-1004夙夜_单一闲聊

content:
You know, many supernatural creatures and oddities are afraid of fireworks,
Because when they burst in mid-air,
They illuminate even the darkest hiding spots.
info: 闲聊-花火祭即将到来闲聊-1004夙夜_单一闲聊

content:
This means
the fireworks festival is relatively safe,
so you can enjoy yourself to the fullest.
info: 闲聊-花火祭即将到来闲聊-1004夙夜_单一闲聊

content:
My first time seeing a fireworks festival
was when I was eight years old,
when I went with my father to a client's house near the plaza.
